sentence.Network_en: I was distressed to find so much vindictiveness in so charming a creature.
sentence.Network_cn: 当我发现这样一个温柔可爱的女性报复心居然这么重时,我感到很丧气.

sentence.Network_en: Contradictory attriButes of unjust justice and loving vindictiveness.
sentence.Network_cn: 不公正的正义和报复的相矛盾的特点.

sentence.Network_en: He withheld the letter out of sheer vindictiveness.
sentence.Network_cn: 他扣下那封信纯粹是出于报复心理.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 有害的或疼痛的；受伤的vindictiveness　恶毒; 怀恨在心disavow　否认，不承认：否认熟悉，拒绝对…承担责任，否认与…有关系.
vindicator 回收, vindictiveness 复仇心理, vindictivedamages 惩罚性损害赔偿金
vindictivedamages 惩罚性损害赔偿金, vindictiveness 报复冲动, vindictiveness 复仇心理

list.abs: a vindictive man will look for occasions for resentment .充满复仇心的人会寻找发泄愤恨的机会。
vindication 证实无罪,证实清白vindictive punishment 报复性惩罚vintage vehicle 古董车
damage ... vegetation damage 植被损害 vindictive damage 惩罚性损害赔偿 war damage 战争损失.
it is not right to harbor vindictive feelings ., 怀有报复的念头是不对的.

entry.tran: 想复仇的;报复性的;怀恨在心的
entry.def: If you say that someone is vindictive, you are critical of them because they deliberately try to upset or cause trouble for someone who they think has done them harm.

example.ex: How can you be so vindictive?
example.tran: 你的报复心怎么那么强？

example.ex: ...a vindictive woman desperate for revenge against the man who loved and left her.
example.tran: 不顾一切企图报复那个对自己始乱终弃的男人的女子

auth_sentence.content: I expected anger, vindictiveness, a desire for retribution.
auth_sentence.res_content: I expected anger, vindictiveness, a desire for retribution.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I expected anger, vindictiveness, a desire for retribution.

auth_sentence.content: We pretended that his temper, megalomania and vindictiveness didn't exist.
auth_sentence.res_content: We pretended that his temper, megalomania and vindictiveness didn't exist.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We pretended that his temper, megalomania and vindictiveness didn't exist.

auth_sentence.content: We never ought to allow our instincts of justice to degenerate into mere vindictiveness.
auth_sentence.res_content: We never ought to allow our instincts of justice to degenerate into mere vindictiveness.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We never ought to allow our instincts of justice to degenerate into mere vindictiveness.
